about_the_game:
This game is NUTZ! Get ready to dive into an action-packed 2D platformer that pits a group of feisty nuts against a sinister rodent gang! Embark on this nutty adventure where you’ll control our courageous nut heroes, each with their unique abilities, as they navigate treacherous levels and take on massive rodent bosses!!

Can you help the Nutz squad restore balance and enact their revenge on the evil rodent gang!?




Prepare for intense boss battles that will push your skills to the limit! Each battle will drive you nuts! Massive, Tough, yet sometimes quirky bosses will challenge you in both strategic solo showdowns and chaotic 5v1 free-for-alls. Avoiding screen filled attacks and exploiting their weaknesses will put you through a test of wit and reflexes. These battles are more than just fights—they’re epic nutty chaos!




Levels are packed with a ton of collectables waiting to be discovered! From elusive power-seeds that boost your abilities to rare trading cards and comic books that tell stories of this nutty world, there’s always something to find. Gather coins to unlock special features, and hunt down costumes to customize your characters with style! With each level teeming with secrets and surprises, collecting becomes an adventure of its own!




Get ready for some nutty surprises! Hidden in every level are awesome bonus rooms waiting to be found! These rooms mix things up with all sorts of fun, from arcade machine challenges to mini-games that’ll keep you on your toes! Each bonus room is a burst of excitement and add a whole new layer of extra fun to your adventure!




Play as all 5 nutty heroes, each with their own unique abilities! Learn their platforming playstyle and unleash their powers to take down the rodent gang together!

Pete & Penny Peanut

Meet Pete and Penny Peanut, the tiny but mighty duo! These twins may be small, but together they're unbeatable! You control both twins as they team up in levels packed with puzzles, challenges, and epic platforming fun! It's all about teamwork as you guide these two through nutty obstacles!

Sgt. Acorn

Say hello to Sgt. Acorn, the tough but lovable leader of the gang! He's got his own special slam attack and a crew of soldier minions ready to help out. Together, they're unstoppable! Get ready for some serious puzzle-solving and obstacle-busting action!

Walter Walnut

Walter Walnut may be an old-timer, but he's still got plenty of tricks up his sleeve! With his speedy dash attack, he's all about classic platforming fun. And watch out for his surprise gas attacks—they'll catch those sneaky rodents off guard every time!

Peggy Pistachio

It's Peggy Pistachio, the seed-slinging sassy superstar! She's got powerful pistachio seeds that she can use to blast herself to new heights or take down targets with style. Get ready to solve puzzles, discover hidden spots, and conquer challenges with Peggy's awesome seed shooting power!


Game Features:

  • Experience classic 2D platforming reminiscent of beloved titles like Donkey Kong Country, Super Mario, Rayman Legends, and Loco Roco!
  • Dynamic physics-based characters and environments ensure puzzle-solving feels fresh and exciting with each playthrough.
  • Embark on adventures with 5 unique main characters, each with their own abilities and weaknesses, guaranteeing every level offers a fresh challenge.
  • Explore compact levels with both vertical and horizontal traversal, encouraging players to uncover secrets in different ways.
  • Discover hidden collectibles throughout each level, including essential items, readable comics, and cool costumes!
  • Prepare for intense boss battles, featuring both solo showdowns and thrilling 5v1 encounters to keep the excitement flowing.
  • Power-up your characters by upgrading their skills and unlocking new abilities as you progress through the game.
  • Encounter a colorful cast of side characters and enemies, adding depth and variety to your platforming journey.
  • Vibrant and lively worlds, filled with unique enemies that challenge you to navigate carefully towards your goal.
  • Uncover bonus rooms in every level, each tailored to the character in charge, offering exciting surprises and rewards.
  • Discover arcade mini-games sprinkled throughout the game, providing a fun diversion from your heroic nutty adventure.
  • Enjoy a fully unique soundtrack that sets the mood for epic boss battles and adds a chill, yet quirky vibe to your platforming escapades.
